name: Labyrinth of Souls
description:
Created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 44 game jam. 

Note: I'm taking some time to create a post-jam version of this which will be more fully featured and hopefully a lot scarier.  If you like this, please come back later and check out the enhanced edition.

Synopsis:

You find yourself a prisoner in the Labyrinth of Souls.  All hope is not lost.  There is a way of escape.  However, there are guardians roaming the labyrinth, searching for souls to devour.  Can you avoid them long enough to escape from the prison you find yourself in, or will the guardians claim your soul?

WARNING: This is an intense experience and may not be suitable for children, pregnant women, people with back or neck problems and those who are easily frightened.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look
  • Shift - Sprint (be careful, you have a sprint meter and will have to walk when it runs out)
  • Escape - Options (mouse sensitivity, invert y, difficulty)

History:

May 1, 2019  -  v j2  -  Fixed issue where mouse sensitivity defaulted to an extremely low value.
